title: Create Cross-Field Validator
description: Create a class-level validator that ensures description is required when priority is URGENT.
instructions:
Create a custom validator @RequireDescriptionForUrgent that:
1. Applies at the class level (not field level)
2. Checks if priority is URGENT
3. If URGENT, validates that description is not blank
4. Returns appropriate error message

hints.text: Use @Target({ElementType.TYPE}) to make the annotation apply to classes instead of fields.
The validator receives the entire TaskRequest object, allowing you to check multiple fields.
